title: Dark Harvest
summaries: The Dark Harvest is a Hardmode whip dropped by the Pumpking during the Pumpkin Moon event. Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy.

Striking an enemy with Dark Harvest applies a "dark energy" aura to the target. Every time a minion attacks that enemy, the dark aura flares out and damages the target as well as nearby enemies for 10 damage (not affected by any damage bonuses) with 50 <linked>armor penetration</linked>.

Hitting an enemy with Dark Harvest will grant the Harvest Time buff, which increases attack speed by 35% for 3 seconds, and the buff duration can be refreshed by hitting enemies with the Dark Harvest again.
If the Dark Harvest hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 10%.
